text: was a castle structure in Hiki, Saitama prefecture Japan. The site was designated a National Historic Site. It has been said that Sugaya yakata was originally Hatakeyama Shigetada`s fortified residence but until now, no relics from that period have been found in excavations. Sugaya Yakata is now only ruins with earthen walls and a dry moat. Saitama Prefectural Ranzan Historical Museum is on site. Sugaya Yakata was listed as one of the Continued Top 100 Japanese Castles in 2017. ==See also== *List of Historic Sites of Japan (Saitama) ==References== Category:Castles in Saitama Prefecture Category:Historic Sites of Japan Category:Former castles in Japan Category:Ruined castles in Japan
title: Sugaya Yakata
